availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas F. Michael (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Michael and Milly Michael. Married to Agnes Michael. Father of William Henry Michael, Martha C. "Kate" Michael, Robert R. Michael, and Luther Michael. Resident of Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 135A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 654.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 157A-B.
"Thomas F. Michael (1833-1904)," Find A Grave, Memorial #82407101, accessed October 26, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82407101.
